com.facebook.buck.util

Class ListeningProcessExecutor

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.facebook.buck.util.ListeningProcessExecutor

  • public class ListeningProcessExecutor
extends java.lang.Object
    Replacement for ProcessBuilder which provides an asynchronous callback interface to notify the caller on a background thread when a process starts, performs I/O, or exits. Unlike ProcessExecutor, this does not automatically forward output to Console formatted with ANSI escapes.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static interface  ListeningProcessExecutor.LaunchedProcess
      Represents a process which was launched by a ListeningProcessExecutor.
      static interface  ListeningProcessExecutor.ProcessListener
      Callback API to notify the caller on a background thread when a process starts, exits, has stdout or stderr bytes to read, or is ready to receive bytes on stdin.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ListeningProcessExecutor() 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void destroyProcess(ListeningProcessExecutor.LaunchedProcess process, boolean force)
      Destroys a process.
      ListeningProcessExecutor.LaunchedProcess launchProcess(ProcessExecutorParams params, ListeningProcessExecutor.ProcessListener listener)
      Launches a process and asynchronously sends notifications to listener on a background thread when the process starts, has I/O, or exits.
      int waitForProcess(ListeningProcessExecutor.LaunchedProcess process, long timeout, java.util.concurrent.TimeUnit timeUnit)
      Blocks the calling thread until either the process exits or the timeout expires, whichever is first.

      • launchProcess

        public ListeningProcessExecutor.LaunchedProcess launchProcess(ProcessExecutorParams params,
                                                     ListeningProcessExecutor.ProcessListener listener)
                                                       throws java.io.IOException

        Throws:

      • waitForProcess

        public int waitForProcess(ListeningProcessExecutor.LaunchedProcess process,
                 long timeout,
                 java.util.concurrent.TimeUnit timeUnit)
                   throws java.lang.InterruptedException
        Blocks the calling thread until either the process exits or the timeout expires, whichever is first.
        Returns:
        Integer.MIN_VALUE if the timeout expired, or the exit code of the process otherwise.
        Throws:
        java.lang.InterruptedException

      • destroyProcess

        public void destroyProcess(ListeningProcessExecutor.LaunchedProcess process,
                  boolean force)
        Destroys a process. If force is true, then forcibly destroys the process in a way it cannot ignore.
